review: I had a hard time getting it to work with my wireless internet provider.  My daughter was living with me so I tried her wireless provider and it worked otherwise I would have had to return it.  I also have the Amazon Fire box.  I had no problems running that off my internet provider.  The Fire TV Stick remote does not have all the commands as the Amazon Fire box remote.  The Amazon Fire box remote is much better.  Like they say..."You get what you pay for".
